Write-Up Text: People are talking about Australia's upcoming federal budget and there's a lot of buzz around welfare payments. 7NEWS have exclusively revealed that older job seekers will receive higher welfare payments than their younger counterparts. Meanwhile Australians are calling for an increase in JobSeeker payments and hoping to see relief from living costs in the budget. Similarly PWDA is asking for support to urge the Australian Prime Minister to make this happen. However there is also controversy surrounding Labor's handling of franking credits and complaints about lack of transparency.
